document.full_text: there were conflicting reports on wednesday about a shooting at the border between georgia and south ossetia, a breakaway enclave under russia's military protection.
document.title: europe: georgia: conflicting reports surround shooting on border with an enclave
lines_and_colors: there were conflicting reports on wednesday about a shooting at the border between georgia and south ossetia, a breakaway enclave under russia's military protection.
